channel.title: Butterfly and Human
channel.description:
I crammed a submission through the deadline-hole of the Pleasure-not-Business Card Jam on itch.io.
Butterfly and Human is more in line with a thought experiment, but I figured it might make for some quick interesting stories for 1-2 people.
If anyone tries it, lemme know how it went.
